body_html:
Looks like gcc 5 has a similar bug to the one referenced in #7223: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gcc-5/+bug/1568899

According to the bug report, a workaround is to "add -lgcc_s -lgcc at the end of the g++ command that links the shared library".

@smistad do you think you could wade into the CMake build and try the workaround? (Even if you don't plumb it all the way through maybe you can at least confirm it works by printing and manually modifying the compiler commands.)
